insert into ISG_MARKET_CHANGE (INTERFACE_ID, OPERATION_TYPE, GDS_ID, DEALER_NO, OLD_SALE_ORG_CODE, NEW_SALE_ORG_CODE, NEW_DEALER_TYPE, NEW_DEALER_SUB_TYPE, APP_FULL_NAME, APP_LAST_NAME, APP_FIRST_NAME, APP_CERTIFICATE_TYPE, APP_CERTIFICATE_NO, SPONSOR, NEW_SALE_BRANCH_NO, DEALER_POST_CODE, UPLOAD_FLAG, ADVISE_NO, PROCESS_STATUS, PROCESS_DATE, PROCESS_MESSAGE, REQUEST_ID, PROGRAM_ID) values (#{interfaceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{operationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gdsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oldSaleOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newSaleOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newDealerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newDealerSubType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appLastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appFirstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appCertificateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appCertificateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sponsor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newSaleBranchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealerPostCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploadFlag, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adviseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, current_timestamp, #{processMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update:
update ISG_MARKET_CHANGE
OPERATION_TYPE = #{operationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GDS_ID = #{gdsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEALER_NO = #{dealerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OLD_SALE_ORG_CODE = #{oldSaleOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEW_SALE_ORG_CODE = #{newSaleOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEW_DEALER_TYPE = #{newDealerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEW_DEALER_SUB_TYPE = #{newDealerSubType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_FULL_NAME = #{appFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_LAST_NAME = #{appLastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_FIRST_NAME = #{appFirstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_CERTIFICATE_TYPE = #{appCertificateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_CERTIFICATE_NO = #{appCertificateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPONSOR = #{sponsor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEW_SALE_BRANCH_NO = #{newSaleBranchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEALER_POST_CODE = #{dealerPostCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPLOAD_FLAG = #{uploadFlag, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADVISE_NO = #{adviseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESS_STATUS = #{processStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESS_DATE = #{processDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PROCESS_MESSAGE = #{processMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where INTERFACE_ID = #{interfaceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update ISG_MARKET_CHANGE set OPERATION_TYPE = #{operationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GDS_ID = #{gdsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEALER_NO = #{dealerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OLD_SALE_ORG_CODE = #{oldSaleOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEW_SALE_ORG_CODE = #{newSaleOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEW_DEALER_TYPE = #{newDealerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEW_DEALER_SUB_TYPE = #{newDealerSubType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_FULL_NAME = #{appFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_LAST_NAME = #{appLastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_FIRST_NAME = #{appFirstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_CERTIFICATE_TYPE = #{appCertificateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_CERTIFICATE_NO = #{appCertificateNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPONSOR = #{sponsor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEW_SALE_BRANCH_NO = #{newSaleBranchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEALER_POST_CODE = #{dealerPostCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPLOAD_FLAG = #{uploadFlag, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADVISE_NO = #{adviseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESS_STATUS = #{processStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESS_DATE = #{processDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PROCESS_MESSAGE = #{processMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where INTERFACE_ID = #{interfaceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
